name: Yenkart: The Haunted School
description:
The Story
It's about a girl named Koyama who used to study at Yenkart School, the school was a nice place with a lovely atmosphere. But one day the teachers have noticed a bizarre behavior from Koyama such as scratching the walls or bringing up sharp items to the school and even attacking the students but after a while, they found her dead inside one of the classrooms for possibly suicide. 3 months later 14 students went missing, the police department has suspected the principal for kidnapping them and they have arrested him for the crime of kidnapping, even though he kept saying that he was innocent they didn't believe him because there was no other evidence, a few weeks of investigations they shut down the school and now it got haunted by Koyama's soul. And now you play as a police officer
